trans-unit.source: Represents language-neutral information for an event log entry.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件記錄檔項目的語言中立資訊。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance> to write an event log entry with a resource identifier rather than a string value.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance>寫入事件記錄檔項目使用的資源識別項，而不是字串值。

trans-unit.source: To write an event log entry, initialize the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.InstanceId%2A> property and pass the instance to the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要寫入事件記錄檔項目，初始化<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.InstanceId%2A>屬性，並傳遞要的執行個體<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The Event Viewer uses the instance identifier to find and display the corresponding string from the localized resource file based on current language settings.
trans-unit.target: 事件檢視器會尋找並顯示目前的語言設定為基礎的當地語系化的資源檔中的對應字串中使用的執行個體識別碼。

trans-unit.source: You must register the event source with the corresponding resource file before you write events using resource identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 您必須先使用資源識別項寫入事件，以對應的資源檔註冊事件來源。

trans-unit.source: When writing events, you can set the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.EntryType%2A> property to specify the icon that the Event Viewer displays for the entry.
trans-unit.target: 當寫入事件時，您可以設定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.EntryType%2A>屬性來指定圖示，事件檢視器顯示的項目。

trans-unit.source: You can also specify a <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.CategoryId%2A> property to specify the category that the Event Viewer displays for the entry.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.CategoryId%2A>屬性來指定 事件檢視器顯示之項目的類別目錄。

trans-unit.source: The Event Viewer uses the category to filter events written by an event source.
trans-unit.target: 事件檢視器會使用要寫入的事件來源的篩選事件的類別目錄。

trans-unit.source: The Event Viewer can display the category as a numeric value, or it can use the category as a resource identifier to display a localized category string.
trans-unit.target: 事件檢視器可以顯示類別目錄做為數值，或它可以使用 「 類別目錄做為資源識別項若要顯示的當地語系化類別目錄字串。

trans-unit.source: To display localized category strings in the Event Viewer, you must use an event source configured with a category resource file, and set the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.CategoryId%2A> to a resource identifier in the category resource file.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示事件檢視器中的當地語系化類別目錄字串，您必須使用事件來源類別資源檔案後，設定和設定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.CategoryId%2A>類別資源檔案中的資源識別項。

trans-unit.source: If the event source does not have a configured category resource file, or the specified <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.CategoryId%2A> does not index a string in the category resource file, and then the Event Viewer displays the numeric category value for that entry.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件來源沒有已設定的類別資源檔案，或指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.CategoryId%2A>索引類別資源檔案，然後按一下 事件檢視器中的字串是否顯示該項目的數值分類值。

trans-unit.source: Configure the category resource file, along with the number of category strings in the resource file, using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller> or the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData> class.
trans-unit.target: 設定類別資源檔案，以及在資源檔中，類別目錄字串數目使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>或<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData>類別。

trans-unit.source: You must register a source for an event log before using <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance> to write an event with the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您必須先使用註冊事件記錄檔的來源<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance>要寫入的事件，該<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The source must be configured for writing localized entries to the log and the source must define at least a message resource file.
trans-unit.target: 來源必須設定當地語系化的項目寫入記錄檔和來源必須定義至少一個訊息資源檔。

trans-unit.source: Create the new event source during the installation of your application.
trans-unit.target: 在您的應用程式的安裝期間建立新的事件來源。

trans-unit.source: This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configurations.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓作業系統重新整理其已註冊的事件來源的清單和其設定的時間。

trans-unit.source: If the operating system has not refreshed its list of event sources, and you attempt to write an event with the new source, the write operation will fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果作業系統不重新整理其事件來源的清單，而且您嘗試寫入的事件，該新的來源寫入作業將會失敗。

trans-unit.source: You can configure a new source using an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>, or using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定新的來源使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>，或使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You must have administrative rights on the computer to create a new event source.
trans-unit.target: 您必須建立新的事件來源電腦上具有系統管理權限。

trans-unit.source: For details about defining event messages and building event log resource files, see the "Message Compiler" topic in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com).
trans-unit.target: 定義事件訊息及建置事件記錄檔資源檔的相關詳細資訊，請參閱 「 訊息編譯器 」 中的主題 Platform SDK 文件，網址為[ http://msdn.microsoft.com ](http://msdn.microsoft.com)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example writes an informational event entry, and then reuses the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance> to write an entry for a warning event to an existing event log.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例寫入資訊事件項目，並再重複使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance>寫入至現有的事件記錄檔的警告事件的一個項目。

trans-unit.source: The event message text is specified using a resource identifier in a message resource file.
trans-unit.target: 事件訊息文字會指定訊息資源檔中使用的資源識別項。

trans-unit.source: The code example assumes that the corresponding message resource file has been registered for the source.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例假設已註冊的來源對應的訊息資源檔。

trans-unit.source: The code example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例會使用下列的訊息文字檔案，內建資源程式庫 EventLogMsgs.dll。

trans-unit.source: A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created.
trans-unit.target: 訊息文字檔案是建立訊息資源檔的來源。

trans-unit.source: The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings.
trans-unit.target: 訊息文字檔案定義的資源識別碼和類別目錄、 事件訊息和參數插入字串的文字。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance" /> class using language-neutral information to define an event log entry.
trans-unit.target: 使用語言中立資訊，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance" /> 類別的新執行個體，以定義事件記錄檔項目。

trans-unit.source: A resource identifier that corresponds to a string defined in the message resource file of the event source.
trans-unit.target: 資源識別項，其對應到事件來源的訊息資源檔內所定義的字串。

trans-unit.source: A resource identifier that corresponds to a string defined in the category resource file of the event source, or zero to specify no category for the event.
trans-unit.target: 資源識別項，其對應到事件來源的分類資源檔中定義的字串，或為零以指定沒有事件分類。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance" /> class using the specified resource identifiers for the localized message and category text of the event entry.
trans-unit.target: 使用事件項目的當地語系化訊息和分類文字的指定資源識別項，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: To write an informational entry to an event log, initialize an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance> and pass it to the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要將參考的項目寫入事件記錄檔，初始化<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance>並將它傳遞給<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Set the `instanceId` to the resource identifier of the event message in the corresponding <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.MessageResourceFile%2A> property for the source.
trans-unit.target: 設定`instanceId`事件訊息中對應的資源識別項<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.MessageResourceFile%2A>來源的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Set the `categoryId` to a numeric category value, or the resource identifier of the event category in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.CategoryResourceFile%2A> property for the source; set the `categoryId` to zero for no event category.
trans-unit.target: 設定`categoryId`的數值分類值，或事件類別目錄中的資源識別元<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.CategoryResourceFile%2A>來源的屬性; 設定`categoryId`為零的任何事件類別目錄。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.EntryType%2A> property for the new instance is set to <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType.Information> by default.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.EntryType%2A>的新執行個體的屬性設定為<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType.Information>預設。

trans-unit.source: The Event Viewer uses the resource identifiers to display the corresponding strings from the localized resource files for the source.
trans-unit.target: 事件檢視器使用的資源識別碼，來顯示來源的當地語系化的資源檔中的對應字串。

trans-unit.source: You must register the source with the corresponding resource files before you can write events using resource identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 您可以撰寫使用資源識別項的事件之前，您必須註冊來源的相對應的資源檔。

trans-unit.source: The following code example writes an informational event entry, and then reuses the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance> to write an entry for a warning event to an existing event log.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例寫入資訊事件項目，並再重複使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance>寫入至現有的事件記錄檔的警告事件的一個項目。

trans-unit.source: The event message text is specified using a resource identifier in a message resource file.
trans-unit.target: 事件訊息文字會指定訊息資源檔中使用的資源識別項。

trans-unit.source: The code example assumes that the corresponding message resource file has been registered for the source.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例假設已註冊的來源對應的訊息資源檔。

trans-unit.source: The code example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例會使用下列的訊息文字檔案，內建資源程式庫 EventLogMsgs.dll。

trans-unit.source: A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created.
trans-unit.target: 訊息文字檔案是建立訊息資源檔的來源。

trans-unit.source: The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings.
trans-unit.target: 訊息文字檔案定義的資源識別碼和類別目錄、 事件訊息和參數插入字串的文字。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="instanceId" /> parameter is a negative value or a value larger than <see cref="F:System.UInt32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="instanceId" /> 參數是負值或大於 <see cref="F:System.UInt32.MaxValue" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="categoryId" /> parameter is a negative value or a value larger than <see cref="F:System.UInt16.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="categoryId" /> 參數是負值或大於 <see cref="F:System.UInt16.MaxValue" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: A resource identifier that corresponds to a string defined in the message resource file of the event source.
trans-unit.target: 資源識別項，其對應到事件來源的訊息資源檔內所定義的字串。

trans-unit.source: A resource identifier that corresponds to a string defined in the category resource file of the event source, or zero to specify no category for the event.
trans-unit.target: 資源識別項，其對應到事件來源的分類資源檔中定義的字串，或為零以指定沒有事件分類。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType" /> value that indicates the event type.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType" /> 值，表示事件型別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance" /> class using the specified resource identifiers for the localized message and category text of the event entry and the specified event log entry type.
trans-unit.target: 使用事件項目的當地語系化訊息和分類文字的指定資源識別項，以及指定的事件記錄檔項目型別，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: To write an entry to an event log, initialize an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance> and pass it to the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要將項目寫入事件記錄檔中，初始化<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance>並將它傳遞給<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Set the `instanceId` to the resource identifier of the event message in the corresponding <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.MessageResourceFile%2A> property for the source.
trans-unit.target: 設定`instanceId`事件訊息中對應的資源識別項<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.MessageResourceFile%2A>來源的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Set the `categoryId` to a numeric category value, or the resource identifier of the event category in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.CategoryResourceFile%2A> property for the source; set the `categoryId` to zero for no event category.
trans-unit.target: 設定`categoryId`的數值分類值，或事件類別目錄中的資源識別元<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.CategoryResourceFile%2A>來源的屬性; 設定`categoryId`為零的任何事件類別目錄。

trans-unit.source: The Event Viewer uses the resource identifiers to display the corresponding strings from the localized resource files for the source.
trans-unit.target: 事件檢視器使用的資源識別碼，來顯示來源的當地語系化的資源檔中的對應字串。

trans-unit.source: You must register the source with the corresponding resource files before you can write events using resource identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 您可以撰寫使用資源識別項的事件之前，您必須註冊來源的相對應的資源檔。

trans-unit.source: Set the `entryType` to one of the pre-defined entry types.
trans-unit.target: 設定`entryType`其中一種預先定義的項目類型。

trans-unit.source: The Event Viewer uses the event type to determine which icon to display in the list view of the event log.
trans-unit.target: 事件檢視器會使用事件類型來決定要在事件記錄檔的清單檢視中顯示的圖示。

trans-unit.source: The following code example writes two audit event entries to the event log `myNewLog`.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會寫入兩個稽核事件記錄檔的事件項目`myNewLog`。

trans-unit.source: The code example creates a new event source and a new event log if they do not exist on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 如果它們尚不存在本機電腦上的程式碼範例會建立新的事件來源和新的事件記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: The event message text is specified using a resource identifier in a resource file.
trans-unit.target: 事件訊息文字會指定資源檔中使用的資源識別項。

trans-unit.source: The code example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例會使用下列的訊息文字檔案，內建資源程式庫 EventLogMsgs.dll。

trans-unit.source: A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created.
trans-unit.target: 訊息文字檔案是建立訊息資源檔的來源。

trans-unit.source: The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings.
trans-unit.target: 訊息文字檔案定義的資源識別碼和類別目錄、 事件訊息和參數插入字串的文字。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="entryType" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="entryType" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="instanceId" /> is a negative value or a value larger than <see cref="F:System.UInt32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="instanceId" /> 是負值或大於 <see cref="F:System.UInt32.MaxValue" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="categoryId" /> is a negative value or a value larger than <see cref="F:System.UInt16.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="categoryId" /> 是負值或大於 <see cref="F:System.UInt16.MaxValue" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the resource identifier that specifies the application-defined category of the event entry.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資源識別項，指定應用程式定義的事件項目分類。

trans-unit.source: A numeric category value or resource identifier that corresponds to a string defined in the category resource file of the event source.
trans-unit.target: 數值分類值或資源識別項，其對應到事件來源的分類資源檔中定義的字串。

trans-unit.source: The default is zero, which signifies that no category will be displayed for the event entry.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為零，表示將不對事件項目顯示任何分類。

trans-unit.source: Event log categories are application-defined values that help filter events, or provide further information about the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件記錄檔分類是應用程式定義的值，用來幫助篩選事件，或提供進一步的事件的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: For example, your application can define separate categories for different components or different operations.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您的應用程式可以定義不同的類別，不同的元件或不同的作業。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.CategoryId%2A> property to specify the category that the Event Viewer displays for the entry.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.CategoryId%2A>屬性來指定 事件檢視器顯示之項目的類別目錄。

trans-unit.source: The Event Viewer can display the category as a numeric value, or it can use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.CategoryId%2A> as a resource identifier to display a localized category string based on the current language settings.
trans-unit.target: 事件檢視器可以顯示類別目錄做為數值，或是使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.CategoryId%2A>做為資源識別項若要顯示的當地語系化類別目錄字串會根據目前的語言設定。

trans-unit.source: To display localized category strings in the Event Viewer, you must use an event source configured with a category resource file, and set the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.CategoryId%2A> to a resource identifier in the category resource file.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示事件檢視器中的當地語系化類別目錄字串，您必須使用事件來源類別資源檔案後，設定和設定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.CategoryId%2A>類別資源檔案中的資源識別項。

trans-unit.source: If the event source does not have a configured category resource file, or the specified <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.CategoryId%2A> does not index a string in the category resource file, and then the Event Viewer displays the numeric category value for that entry.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件來源沒有已設定的類別資源檔案，或指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.CategoryId%2A>索引類別資源檔案，然後按一下 事件檢視器中的字串是否顯示該項目的數值分類值。

trans-unit.source: You must register the source with the corresponding resource file before you write event categories using resource identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 寫入事件類別目錄使用資源識別項之前，必須與對應的資源檔登錄來源。

trans-unit.source: Configure the category resource file, along with the number of category strings in the resource file, using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller> or the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData> class.
trans-unit.target: 設定類別資源檔案，以及在資源檔中，類別目錄字串數目使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>或<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData>類別。

trans-unit.source: When defining category strings in a resource file, the category resource identifiers must be numbered consecutively starting at 1, up to the configured <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.CategoryCount%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 當資源檔中定義類別目錄字串，必須連續 1 開始，最多設定編號類別資源識別元<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.CategoryCount%2A>屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Event categories are optional.
trans-unit.target: 事件類別目錄是選擇性的。

trans-unit.source: If your application does not use categories, do not set the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.CategoryId%2A> for the event log entry.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式不會使用類別，請勿設定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.CategoryId%2A>事件記錄檔項目。

trans-unit.source: For details about defining event messages and building event resource files, see the "Message Compiler" topic in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/). For details about defining event categories in resource files, see the "Event Categories" topic in the Platform SDK
trans-unit.target: 定義事件訊息及建置事件資源檔的相關詳細資訊，請參閱 「 訊息編譯器 」 中的主題 Platform SDK 文件，網址為[ http://msdn.microsoft.com ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/)。如需在資源檔中定義的事件類別目錄的詳細資訊，請參閱 Platform SDK 中的 「 事件類別目錄 」 主題

trans-unit.source: The following code example writes an informational event entry, and then reuses the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance> to write an entry for a warning event to an existing event log.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例寫入資訊事件項目，並再重複使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance>寫入至現有的事件記錄檔的警告事件的一個項目。

trans-unit.source: The event message text is specified using a resource identifier in a message resource file.
trans-unit.target: 事件訊息文字會指定訊息資源檔中使用的資源識別項。

trans-unit.source: The code example assumes that the corresponding message resource file has been registered for the source.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例假設已註冊的來源對應的訊息資源檔。

trans-unit.source: The code example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例會使用下列的訊息文字檔案，內建資源程式庫 EventLogMsgs.dll。

trans-unit.source: A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created.
trans-unit.target: 訊息文字檔案是建立訊息資源檔的來源。

trans-unit.source: The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings.
trans-unit.target: 訊息文字檔案定義的資源識別碼和類別目錄、 事件訊息和參數插入字串的文字。

trans-unit.source: The property is set to a negative value or to a value larger than <see cref="F:System.UInt16.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 屬性會設定為負數或設定為大於 <see cref="F:System.UInt16.MaxValue" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the event type of the event log entry.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定事件記錄檔項目的事件型別。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType" /> value that indicates the event entry type.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType" /> 值，表示事件項目型別。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType.Information" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType.Information" />。

trans-unit.source: Each event is of a single type, which the application indicates when it reports the event.
trans-unit.target: 每個事件是單一型別，表示應用程式時報告事件。

trans-unit.source: The Event Viewer uses the event type to determine which icon to display in the list view of the event log.
trans-unit.target: 事件檢視器會使用事件類型來決定要在事件記錄檔的清單檢視中顯示的圖示。

trans-unit.source: The following code example writes an informational event entry, and then reuses the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance> to write an entry for a warning event to an existing event log.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例寫入資訊事件項目，並再重複使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance>寫入至現有的事件記錄檔的警告事件的一個項目。

trans-unit.source: The event message text is specified using a resource identifier in a message resource file.
trans-unit.target: 事件訊息文字會指定訊息資源檔中使用的資源識別項。

trans-unit.source: The code example assumes that the corresponding message resource file has been registered for the source.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例假設已註冊的來源對應的訊息資源檔。

trans-unit.source: The code example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例會使用下列的訊息文字檔案，內建資源程式庫 EventLogMsgs.dll。

trans-unit.source: A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created.
trans-unit.target: 訊息文字檔案是建立訊息資源檔的來源。

trans-unit.source: The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings.
trans-unit.target: 訊息文字檔案定義的資源識別碼和類別目錄、 事件訊息和參數插入字串的文字。

trans-unit.source: The property is not set to a valid <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 屬性未設定為有效的 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the resource identifier that designates the message text of the event entry.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資源識別項，指定事件項目的訊息文字。

trans-unit.source: A resource identifier that corresponds to a string defined in the message resource file of the event source.
trans-unit.target: 資源識別項，其對應到事件來源的訊息資源檔內所定義的字串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.InstanceId%2A> property uniquely identifies an event entry for a configured event source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.InstanceId%2A>屬性可唯一識別已設定的事件來源的事件項目。

trans-unit.source: For events defined in message resource files, the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.InstanceId%2A> corresponds to the resource identifier compiled from the message definition fields in the message text file.
trans-unit.target: 訊息資源檔中定義的事件<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.InstanceId%2A>對應到從郵件定義欄位中的訊息文字檔案編譯的資源識別碼。

trans-unit.source: Your application can write localized event log entries by setting the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.InstanceId%2A> to a resource identifier.
trans-unit.target: 您的應用程式可以藉由設定寫入當地語系化的事件記錄項目<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.InstanceId%2A>資源識別項。

trans-unit.source: The Event Viewer uses the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.InstanceId%2A> resource identifier to find and display the corresponding string from the localized resource file based on current language settings.
trans-unit.target: 事件檢視器會使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.InstanceId%2A>資源識別碼來尋找並顯示當地語系化的資源檔中的對應字串取決於目前的語言設定。

trans-unit.source: You must register the source with the corresponding resource file before you write events using resource identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 您必須先使用資源識別項寫入事件，以對應的資源檔註冊來源。

trans-unit.source: For details about defining event messages and building event log resource files, see the "Message Compiler" topic in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/). For details about event log identifiers, see the "Event Identifiers" topic in the Platform SDK.
trans-unit.target: 定義事件訊息及建置事件記錄檔資源檔的相關詳細資訊，請參閱 「 訊息編譯器 」 中的主題 Platform SDK 文件，網址為[ http://msdn.microsoft.com ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/)。如需有關事件記錄檔識別碼的詳細資訊，請參閱 Platform SDK 中的 < 事件識別碼 > 主題。

trans-unit.source: The following code example writes an informational event entry, and then reuses the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance> to write an entry for a warning event to an existing event log.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例寫入資訊事件項目，並再重複使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance>寫入至現有的事件記錄檔的警告事件的一個項目。

trans-unit.source: The event message text is specified using a resource identifier in a message resource file.
trans-unit.target: 事件訊息文字會指定訊息資源檔中使用的資源識別項。

trans-unit.source: The code example assumes that the corresponding message resource file has been registered for the source.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例假設已註冊的來源對應的訊息資源檔。

trans-unit.source: The code example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例會使用下列的訊息文字檔案，內建資源程式庫 EventLogMsgs.dll。

trans-unit.source: A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created.
trans-unit.target: 訊息文字檔案是建立訊息資源檔的來源。

trans-unit.source: The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings.
trans-unit.target: 訊息文字檔案定義的資源識別碼和類別目錄、 事件訊息和參數插入字串的文字。

trans-unit.source: The property is set to a negative value or to a value larger than <see cref="F:System.UInt32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 屬性會設定為負數或設定為大於 <see cref="F:System.UInt32.MaxValue" /> 的值。
